meta.name: A Little Bit of Stand Up To Cancer
meta.description: Dermot Murnaghan launches the nightly update for Stand Up To Cancer 2025's week of fundraising action. Expect headline-grabbing celebrity stunts, powerful stories already grabbing the headlines and an unmissable look at what's still to come.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Dermot Murnaghan returns with the final nightly update before tomorrow's big night of Stand Up To Cancer. Tonight's show delivers one of the campaign's biggest surprises.

videos.overview: Dermot Murnaghan returns with Wednesday's round-up of Stand Up To Cancer 2025. Tonight's update brings you the latest headlines, celebrity stunts and the emotional stories driving this week's fundraising campaign.
